 2024-06902024-06-17EC
ActHistoric Sites and Monuments Act
PrecisAppointment of KAREN AIRD of Kamloops, British Columbia, to be a member of the Historic Sites and Monuments Board of Canada, as a representative of the Province of British Columbia, to hold office during pleasure for a period of five years.
